commitResults.messageTitle: [level 0] Refactor Duke to Friday with improved console output and line helper
build: integrate Gradle build system into Java project
feat: implement echo mode for user interaction
commitResults.messageBody:
- implemented an echo feature that exits with "bye"
- configure Gradle to forward stdin
- added a gradle properties file to toggle simple or enhanced console
  view

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: implement addTask and printTasklist methods
commitResults.messageBody:
- addTask: add a new Task to the TaskList, throws a custom exception
(TaskListFullException) if full
- printTaskList: print all the tasks added with numbering
- add 4 custom exceptions:
  -> TaskListFullException
  -> TaskListEmptyException
  ->TaskListIndexOutOfBoundsException
  -> TaskListException (base exception)

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: add input parsing, mark/unmark tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
- parseInput method handles user commands (add, list, mark, unmark)
- markTask/unmarkTask update task completion status
- printTaskList now shows numbered tasks with [X]/[ ] status
- exception handling for common input errors

commitResults.messageTitle: refactor: reformat code to match coding standards
